sys_cb_topic.description: Virtual Agent conversation flow to Change Password
sys_cb_topic.name: Change Password

sys_update_version.name: sys_cb_topic_b7c924531b8421103ddb639bbc4bcbc0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_cb_topic"><sys_cb_topic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><applicability/><applicability_mode>query</applicability_mode><autopilot_topic>false</autopilot_topic><category/><channels/><connect_queue/><description>Virtual Agent conversation flow to Change Password</description><expose_on_palette>false</expose_on_palette><flexible_conversation_switching>false</flexible_conversation_switching><graph>{
  "graph_api_version": "1.0.41",
  "goals": {
    "primary": {
      "id": "primary",
      "trigger": {
        "type": "primary"
      },
      "name": "primary",
      "applicability": "",
      "description": "",
      "nodes": {
        "f309a8390b26476682aac6a6b42e17d6": {
          "id": "f309a8390b26476682aac6a6b42e17d6",
          "stepType": "Start",
          "name": "Start",
          "greetingResponse": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""
          }
        },
        "cd7f09917722470eb84fd923acbe0811": {

          "stepType": "TerminateGoal",
          "name": "End",
          "confirmationMessage": {
            "mode": "simple",
            "value": ""
          }
        },
        "9182f796772042b8978aeb97d7ade195": {
          "stepType": "ReferenceChoicePrompt",
          "name": "Change Password Process Choice",
          "prompt": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  },
                  {
                    "text": "Which password would you like to change?"
                  },
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "confirmMessage": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "acknowledgeMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "mode": "query",
            "value": ""
          },
          "skippable": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "defaultValue": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "variableId": "f5bd14a1fc604a4faaa5b1f2b3e0afe0",
          "id": "9182f796772042b8978aeb97d7ade195",
          "mode": "external",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    // Populate change password processes for logged in user\n    return JSON.parse(vaVars.pwd_change_processes);  \n})()\n",
          "noRecordsResponseMsg": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n     return '';\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "condition": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    // Populate change password processes for logged in user\n    return JSON.parse(vaVars.pwd_change_processes);  \n})()\n",
            "mode": "external_script"
          },
          "withNluUserInput": false,
          "skipIfFulfilled": false,
          "cardMetadata": {
            "mode": "card",
            "metadataScript": "",
            "cardTemplate": "",
            "cardFields": {},
            "cardDefinition": {}
          },
          "hasCardHeader": false
        },
        "17dc9775f6d14dabb5d9b484b4fa5e6f": {
          "id": "17dc9775f6d14dabb5d9b484b4fa5e6f",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Check Change Password Action Result"
        },
        "bddabb4814804584a2ed75bf2458ac21": {
          "id": "bddabb4814804584a2ed75bf2458ac21",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Show Change Password Success Message",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return vaVars.pwd_change_success_message;\n})()",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "db5a95c4c10b4ea3ba10eccca0ad9540": {
          "id": "db5a95c4c10b4ea3ba10eccca0ad9540",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Show Password Rule Hint",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Populate password rule hint.\n    */\n    var ruleHint = new global.PasswordResetScopedUtil().getPasswordRuleHint(vaVars.pwd_change_selected_process_id.toString());\n    return gs.getMessage(\"Make sure your password meets these requirements:\\n{0}\", ruleHint);\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "48d7afa62c224eb5b4f8acc939273c6e": {
          "id": "48d7afa62c224eb5b4f8acc939273c6e",
          "name": "Populate Change Password Process",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Populate change password processes for logged in user\n    */ \n    var options = [];\n    var passwordResetScopedUtilObj = new global.PasswordResetScopedUtil();\n    var processIds = passwordResetScopedUtilObj.getChangePasswordProcessIds(gs.getUserID());\n    for (var i = 0; i < processIds.length; i++) {\n        var processId = processIds[i];\n        var process = getProcessDetails(processId);\n        if (process != undefined) {\n            options.push(process);\n        }\n    }\n    vaVars.pwd_change_processes = JSON.stringify(options);\n\n    function getProcessDetails(processId) {\n        var gr = new GlideRecord('pwd_process');\n        gr.get(processId)\n        processDetails = {\n                'value': gr.getUniqueValue(),\n                'label': gr.getDisplayValue('label')  == \"\" || gr.getDisplayValue('label') == null\n                ?  gr.getValue('name') : gr.getDisplayValue('label')\n        }\n        return processDetails;\n    }\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    return true;\n})()\n"
          }
        },
        "77e6e9cb724d4de290045e36cb50d3d9": {
          "id": "77e6e9cb724d4de290045e36cb50d3d9",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Check Change Password Process Count"
        },
        "6edb9c6419a14362ad2343bf830dd947": {
          "id": "6edb9c6419a14362ad2343bf830dd947",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Show Default Process Selection",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* If Single change password process is configured, initialize default selection.\n    */\n    var process = JSON.parse(vaVars.pwd_change_processes);\n    vaVars.pwd_change_selected_process_id = process[0].value;\n    return gs.getMessage(\"OK, you're changing the password for  {0}\", process[0].label);\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "9545430dd03142ef8b05883eced3b81c": {
          "id": "9545430dd03142ef8b05883eced3b81c",
          "name": "Set User Selected Process ",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    /* Initialize the chage password process selection\n    */\n    vaVars.pwd_change_selected_process_id = vaInputs.change_password_process_choice.toString();\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
        "b1462b3b562448cdbe87587a5868900b": {
          "id": "b1462b3b562448cdbe87587a5868900b",
          "stepType": "TextOutput",
          "name": "Show Change Password Failed Message",
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n    return vaVars.pwd_change_failure_message;\n})()",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "secure": false
        },
        "1ee9b3a1853e49638b83d72ac7ab3b53": {
          "id": "1ee9b3a1853e49638b83d72ac7ab3b53",
          "stepType": "Decision",
          "name": "Does Channel Support Password Field"
        },
        "159c154f93d947739c660b5168311d53": {
          "id": "159c154f93d947739c660b5168311d53",
          "stepType": "LinkOutput",
          "name": "Change Password Link",
          "url": {
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    return gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + 'nav_to.do?uri=$pwd_change.do';\n})()\n",
            "mode": "script"
          },
          "label": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Click here to change password."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "header": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "I'm not able to change your password. "
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          },
          "linkType": "single",
          "introMsg": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "listOfLinks": ""
        },

        "9704843089af464899884abb61041943": {
          "id": "9704843089af464899884abb61041943",

      "edges": [
        {
          "id": "6c155bbf12674affb6073c4db098590d",
          "edgeType": "Edge",
          "source": "9545430dd03142ef8b05883eced3b81c",
          "target": "db5a95c4c10b4ea3ba10eccca0ad9540",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": ""
        },
        {
          "id": "84cc52f675d44eed9053b374609fad16",
          "edgeType": "Edge",
          "source": "b1462b3b562448cdbe87587a5868900b",
          "target": "987759e5efb64f3ea03f663e2e1ff0e5",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": ""
        },
        {
          "id": "2713dfd601f1434b91ef2ae821713e7b",
          "edgeType": "Branch",
          "source": "17dc9775f6d14dabb5d9b484b4fa5e6f",
          "target": "b1462b3b562448cdbe87587a5868900b",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    if(vaInputs.change_result == 'failure') {\n        vaVars.pwd_change_failure_message = vaInputs.change_error_message;\n        return true;\n    }\n    else if(vaInputs.change_result == 'block') {\n        vaVars.pwd_change_failure_message = gs.getMessage(\"I wasn't able to change your password for you because you've either already changed it recently or reached the limit on update attempts.\");\n        return true;\n    }\n    return false;\n})()"
          },
          "label": "Change Password Failed Or User Is Blocked"
        },
        {
          "id": "b919282517ca401bbdaf741b3b57668d",
          "edgeType": "Edge",
          "source": "159c154f93d947739c660b5168311d53",
          "target": "f2a70f0ae9b34cf28f00778652f66c5c",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": ""
        },
        {
          "id": "604ff58c8a8d44719b716e0b824c9311",
          "edgeType": "Branch",
          "source": "1ee9b3a1853e49638b83d72ac7ab3b53",
          "target": "159c154f93d947739c660b5168311d53",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var PROP_VA_PASSWORD_SUPPORTED_CHANNELS = \"sn_pwdreset_va.supported_channels\";\n    var SPLIT_CHAR = \",\";\n    return gs.getProperty(PROP_VA_PASSWORD_SUPPORTED_CHANNELS).split(SPLIT_CHAR).indexOf(vaContext.deviceType) < 0;\n})()\n"
          },
          "label": "Channel Does Not Support Password Field"
        },
        {
          "id": "57b4369c0515405ca0f19522c447ee4b",
          "edgeType": "Branch",
          "source": "17dc9775f6d14dabb5d9b484b4fa5e6f",
          "target": "bddabb4814804584a2ed75bf2458ac21",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    if(vaInputs.change_result == 'success') {\n        vaVars.pwd_change_success_message = gs.getMessage(\"Great! You have a new password! Please log in again using your new password.\");\n        return true;\n    }\n    else if(vaInputs.change_result == 'pending') {\n        vaVars.pwd_change_success_message = gs.getMessage(\"Your request for a password change has been initiated. After the request is completed, you will get a confirmation.\");\n        return true;\n    }\n    return false;\n})()"
          },
          "label": "Change Password Success Or Pending"
        },
        {
          "id": "c47e93caf8584d538c85848a38707c03",
          "edgeType": "Edge",
          "source": "48d7afa62c224eb5b4f8acc939273c6e",
          "target": "77e6e9cb724d4de290045e36cb50d3d9",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": ""
        },
        {
          "id": "ad45be68fa9c426a8cb9587254089f22",
          "edgeType": "Branch",
          "source": "77e6e9cb724d4de290045e36cb50d3d9",
          "target": "9182f796772042b8978aeb97d7ade195",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* If more than one change password processes are configured for user\n    */\n    var processes = JSON.parse(vaVars.pwd_change_processes);\n    return processes.length > 1;\n})()\n"
          },
          "label": "Multi Process"
        },
        {
          "id": "2b78cdd218fa43e1b438ddae20d457b6",
          "edgeType": "Branch",
          "source": "77e6e9cb724d4de290045e36cb50d3d9",
          "target": "159c154f93d947739c660b5168311d53",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* If change password process is not configured for user.\n    */\n    var processes = JSON.parse(vaVars.pwd_change_processes);\n    return processes.length == 0;\n})()\n"
          },
          "label": "Process Not Configured"
        },
        {
          "id": "74dbe6c643cc47ac9d16be46ede39c7c",
          "edgeType": "Branch",
          "source": "77e6e9cb724d4de290045e36cb50d3d9",
          "target": "6edb9c6419a14362ad2343bf830dd947",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    /* Check number of change password process entitled for user, if single process exists,\n     select it.\n    */\n    var processes = JSON.parse(vaVars.pwd_change_processes);\n    return processes.length == 1;\n})()\n"
          },
          "label": "Single Process"
        },
        {
          "id": "a728a9cad9ae4b29a09d9a751321c03e",
          "edgeType": "Edge",
          "source": "9182f796772042b8978aeb97d7ade195",
          "target": "9545430dd03142ef8b05883eced3b81c",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": ""
        },
        {
          "id": "fa93279e17d843db9cdc907ca39d2060",

          "source": "6edb9c6419a14362ad2343bf830dd947",
          "target": "db5a95c4c10b4ea3ba10eccca0ad9540",
          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": ""
        },
        {
          "id": "b4e8ae665487472496feec8f0150b996",
          "edgeType": "Edge",
          "source": "f309a8390b26476682aac6a6b42e17d6",
          "target": "1ee9b3a1853e49638b83d72ac7ab3b53",

        },
        {
          "id": "1570a4de50d34934b0377ca379c17f5a",

          "source": "1ee9b3a1853e49638b83d72ac7ab3b53",

          "sourcePort": "",
          "targetPort": "",
          "expression": {
            "mode": "script",
            "value": "(function execute() {\n    var PROP_VA_PASSWORD_SUPPORTED_CHANNELS = \"sn_pwdreset_va.supported_channels\";\n    var SPLIT_CHAR = \",\";\n    return gs.getProperty(PROP_VA_PASSWORD_SUPPORTED_CHANNELS).split(SPLIT_CHAR).indexOf(vaContext.deviceType) > -1;\n})()\n"
          },
          "label": "Channel Supports Password Field"
        },
        {
